short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps users to auto accept all cookies on any websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps users to auto accept all cookies when users land on a new site. I created this because, as an ordinary internet citizen,  I don't mind accepting all cookie and I get a little annoyed when a site prompted me to accept cookies.
